description.en: The story of a guy named Tokio, who's a descendant of a legendary family of youma (demon) fighters. He has the ability to freeze time because of the youma he has in his eye, Catoblepas. One day, he encounters a girl who became a target of a demon. Tokio, with his eye, will try to prevent the girl from becoming another victim of a string of mysterious events that have occured in the town as of late. Little does the girl know that Tokio is her next door neighbour.

biography.en:
**Alt names**:
田中靖規

His real name is Tanaka Yasunori.

Worked as an assistant for [Araki Hirohiko](https://mangadex.org/author/03e4afc4-cd94-45a0-bb36-dfd34fa370b3) on [Steel Ball Run](https://mangadex.org/title/b30dfee3-9d1d-4e8d-bfbe-8fcabc3c96f6).
[Horikoshi Kouhei](https://mangadex.org/author/02795b9a-2128-403c-b03e-e25dc3e3b0a2) worked as his assistant on [Hitomi no Catoblepas](https://mangadex.org/title/6a559e16-b475-43fd-9500-61e8d91e3239).
